text: Daniela Fusar Poli (born 17 October 1984) is a road cyclist from Italy. She represented her nation at the 2004 UCI Road World Championships. She also represented Italy at the 2006 European Road Championships finishing 11th in the under-23 road race. ==References== ==External links== * profile at Procyclingstats.com Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Legnano Category:Italian female cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy
title: Daniela Fusar Poli
